ctx: intros s0 a p sigma pa H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros s0 a p sigma pa H1 H2. unfold state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset in *. intros a' p' H3. destruct (N.eq_dec a a'). - subst. rewrite e in H3. inversion H3. subst. clear H3. rewrite e in H2. specialize (H2 p' eq_refl) as [n [H4 H5]]. exists n. split. + auto. + apply pl_tl_length_produit; auto. - rewrite s_produit_r_neq; auto. specialize (H1 a' p' H3) as [n [H4 H5]]. exists n. split. + auto. + apply pl_tl_length_neq; auto.
